document.full_text: america's most popular sport was plunged into crisis as negotiations between the nfl and the player's union collapsed on friday, triggering instant legal action from the biggest names in the sport that threatens to disrupt next season and cost billions of dollars.
document.title: nfl plunged into crisis as labor talks collapse
lines_and_colors: america's most popular sport was plunged into crisis as negotiations between the nfl and the player's union collapsed on friday, triggering instant legal action from the biggest names in the sport that threatens to disrupt next season and cost billions of dollars.
